data.title: Slaughterhouse-Five Unisex T-Shirt
data.meta_description: Men's/unisex book cover tee for Slaughterhouse-Five by Kurt Vonnegut, Jr. Purchase of this literary shirt sends one book to a community in need.
data.text:
{"id":4530787811418,"title":"Slaughterhouse-Five Women’s Relaxed Fit T-Shirt","handle":"slaughterhouse-five-womens-relaxed-fit-t-shirt","description":"

Vonnegut actually witnessed firsthand the firebombing of Dresden as a POW and lived to tell a version of the tale. "So it goes." From the first edition dust jacket by prolific cover artist Paul Bacon.

© Kurt Vonnegut LLC. Courtesy of Universal.

Product Details
  • Cotton/poly wide neck tee
  • Distressed, softened print
  • Color: vintage navy
Size & Fit
  • Relaxed fit
  • Runs true to size
  • Available in XS-3XL

"This is a tale of a meeting of two lonesome, skinny, fairly old white men on a planet that was dying fast." From the first edition cover.

Product Details
  • Cotton/poly scoop neck tee
  • Distressed, softened print
  • Color: vintage red
Size & Fit
  • Slim fit; runs a size small
